name: instCountableDFinsupp
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : ι → Type u_2
inst✝² : (i : ι) → Zero (α i)
inst✝¹ : Countable ι
inst✝ : ∀ (i : ι), Countable (α i)
⊢ Countable (DFinsupp fun i => α i)
decl:
instance [Countable ι] [∀ i, Countable (α i)] : Countable (Π₀ i, α i) := by
  classical
    let _ := Encodable.ofCountable ι
    let _ := fun i ↦ Encodable.ofCountable (α i)
    infer_instance
